info.name: Challenge Deposit
info.description:
Please view the documentation first to start the Authentication process - Importantly for the Authenctication to succeed you have to first configure the Request Parameters as follows:

The request body must be sent in `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` format and should include the following parameters:

- Customer-Id(text): The unique identifier for the user attempting to authenticate.
    
- Api-Key(text): The API password associated with the provided Customer-id.

body.raw:
{
    "amount": "0.01",
    "currency": "EUR",
    "referenceId":"123xyz", //Must be unique each time
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "language": "en", //de for German, en for English, fr for French
    "country": "DE", //2 letter ISO code in Caps - eg. DE for Germany or GB for UK
    "paymentReason": "Challenge Deposit",
    "merchantIBAN": "ES2501822200160201933547", //This is a test IBAN
    "piiToggle": 1,
    "nameMatchLogic": "fuzzy",
    "redirectUrl": "https://www.idcanopy.com" //replace with your required redirect URL
}
